dcterms:creator: K. Song
Y. Yan
dcterms:description: A publicly available micro surface defect dataset consisting of 35 images of surface defects in silicon steel strips, categorized into spot-defect images and steel-pit-defect images, with random background textures.
dcterms:title: Micro Surface Defect (MSD) Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
K. Batzner
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: A comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection, containing various objects and their corresponding anomalies.
dcterms:title: MVTec Anomaly Detection Dataset (MVTec AD)

dcterms:creator: T. Bao
J. Chen
W. Li
X. Wang
J. Fei
L. Wu
R. Zhao
Y. Zheng
dcterms:description: A maintenance inspection dataset designed for unsupervised anomaly detection, providing various images for testing and validation.
dcterms:title: Maintenance Inspection Dataset (MIAD)
